Name: Best Pearl
About the game: Best Pearl is a shooter where one of the sea inhabitants repels attacks, protecting the pearl he found. Be careful the steering wheel landing can hurt you. Don't let them get it. They must not reach her. You can handle it. Features of the game: - Beautiful Pixel-Art - Music - Simple operation - Complexity
